rows.label: xs31020100_MSG0010
rows.name: Disappeared?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31020100_MSG0020
rows.name: What do you mean?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31020100_MSG0030
rows.name:
It seems an unidentified disappearance phenomenon
is occurring here and there across Mira.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31020100_MSG0040
rows.name: Disappearance phenomenon?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31020100_MSG0050
rows.name: This phenomenon, which occurred simultaneously in various places,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31020100_MSG0060
rows.name: Is expanding its domain while swallowing everything.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31020100_MSG0070
rows.name:
After being swallowed, let alone matter,
not a single electromagnetic wave remains.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31020100_MSG0080
rows.name: One can only express it as truly "disappeared."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31020100_MSG0090
rows.name: Doesn't seem like just a natural disaster.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31020100_MSG0100
rows.name:
The phenomenon is still localized
and the expansion is extremely slow, but[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31020100_MSG0110
rows.name:
That domain might eventually reach
even this NLA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31020100_MSG0120
rows.name: You mean NLA will disappear too!?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31020100_MSG0130
rows.name: That's terrible-meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31020100_MSG0140
rows.name: I'll start preparing to run away immediately-meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31020100_MSG0150
rows.name: Run away where?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31020100_MSG0160
rows.name: It's happening all over the place.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31020100_MSG0170
rows.name: No matter where you go, it's the same.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31020100_MSG0180
rows.name: If it swallows anything and everything...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31020100_MSG0185
rows.name: Building a breakwater would be useless, huh.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31020100_MSG0190
rows.name:
As the ancient saying goes,
"Pushing against a shop curtain."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31020100_MSG0200
rows.name: First, we need a detailed investigation.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31020100_MSG0210
rows.name: Let's investigate a place where the phenomenon is prominently seen.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31020100_MSG0220
rows.name: Agreed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31020100_MSG0230
rows.name: Please be extremely careful.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31020100_MSG0240
rows.name: We truly don't know what's happening.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31020100_MSG0250
rows.name: Yeah. But since coming to this planet...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31020100_MSG0260
rows.name: It's rarer for things not to be that way.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31020100_MSG0270
rows.name: Exactly.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31020100_MSG0280
rows.name: That is precisely why life is wonderful![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31020100_MSG0290
rows.name: As the ancient saying goes, "All's well that ends well."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31020100_MSG0300
rows.name: We've only just started, though.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31020100_MSG0310
rows.name: Ahahaha[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31020100_MSG0320
rows.name: This is no time to be investigating the Central Life.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31020100_MSG0330
rows.name: Both are matters of life and death, but...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31020100_MSG0340
rows.name:
Even if we could survive based on the
Central Life investigation results...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31020100_MSG0350
rows.name: If Mira disappears due to this disappearance phenomenon, it's pointless.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31020100_MSG0360
rows.name:
For now, I will only inform the squad members
that the investigation is continuing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31020100_MSG0370
rows.name: Yeah, please do.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31020100_MSG0380
rows.name: Better than causing a panic.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31020100_MSG0390
rows.name: Elma-san?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31020100_MSG0400
rows.name: You know, Lin...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31020100_MSG0410
rows.name: The things happening now are not separate events.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31020100_MSG0415
rows.name: Actually, they are all connected.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31020100_MSG0420
rows.name: [ST:wide ]—I have that feeling.[ST:wait ]
